name: Blue Pill Glitch
description: Enter the simulation with friends to locate Meow & get to the bottom of the Blue Pill Glitch! Blue Pill Glitch is a online multiplayer game where you need to locate Meow before its too late. You get dropped off in the center of the city & are tasked to search through buildings to find Meows apartment, but there is a problem. The Suits stand in your way & fight you trying to prevent you from finding Meow. Link up with up to 8 friends & find Meow before its too late!
